title: EtherFi eETH + Pendle LP sample
description: Reference case pulled from Etherscan to help validate wallet_inspector against EtherFi staking flows.

etherscan_references.label: ether.fi ETH (eETH)
etherscan_references.notes: Liquid staking token issued by ether.fi

etherscan_references.label: Wrapped eETH (weETH)
etherscan_references.notes: Wrapper used for Pendle and Karak LP positions

etherscan_references.label: eETH LP (27 JUN 2024)
etherscan_references.notes: Yearn vault representing Pendle eETH LP staking

expected_behaviour: Wallet inspector should highlight eETH/weETH balances and treat the Pendle LP exposure as a staking hint.
sample_prompt_suffix: Call out these EtherFi + Pendle references when summarising wallets with similar flows.
